<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bloodline Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=6104) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=824" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 154 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Your magical blood makes you more resistant to magic. You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against spells and [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644) effects.
name: Bloodline Resistance
